title: Aurelion Sol - skin concept ( DEEP SEA AURELION SOL)
body:
So I had an idea of a sea creature AureLion Sol the minute i saw his champion's model and abilities, some others in this community aslo saw this and asked for an atlantian skin. Since the waterskins in league are usually like Deep sea themed i decided to go with that and birthed this :D 
http://i.imgur.com/EKFGHb5.png

**Description:**
He's more of an aquatic dragon with this skin with bio-luminescent spots like angler-fish (to mimic his stars in his original model). His gold crown is replaced with a black metallic headpiece and his jaws are more of a limestone coraline material. His flowing hair is now fins and he has webbed appendages.

**Abilities:**
**Passive:** the stars that orbit him are now glowing blue sea pearls with a water stream around them
**Q:** is a whirl pool with a glowing center to mimic the newborn star
**W:** the pearls and water streams dash around him instead of the stars, making more of a water splashing sound yet still maintaining the star explosions
**E:** instead of flying in a stream of galactic clouds he flies (swims) in a stream of water, like his pearls
**R:** instead of breathing star energy he could breathe a blast or water.

Hope u guys like it :D 
Riot please please please
